response.overview: Min-ho and Hee-jung have been married for over 40 years. One day, Min-ho collapses with a heart attack. Now, he's worried about his wife who will be left alone after he is gone. However, the shadow of death finds its way to his wife first. Hee-jung is diagnosed with cancer and has only two months to live. It seems that death is trying to teach Min-ho a lesson: love and happiness in life brings nothing but pain. Now, Min-ho has found a way to deceive death and die in the presence of love and happiness.
response.title: Hand in Hand
